```{r}
gsaf %>% 
  select(Date, Year, Country, Age, ⁠ Sex `, `Fatal (Y/N) ⁠`) %>% 
  rename(sex =⁠ Sex `, fatal = `Fatal (Y/N)` ⁠) %>%

  select(Year, year) %>%
  sample_n(6)
```
